name: ISLET_INF_PRTL_PRS
description: Portal pressure changes during islet infusion.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PORTAL_PRESSURE
columns.description: The portal pressure in mm Hg for islet cells infused into the portal vein.

columns.name: PORT_PRESS_TIMELINE
columns.description: The portal pressure timeline in minutes.

columns.name: PROC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Procedure status indicating the stage of islet transplant.
